title: Unable to change name on new client
body: Can anyone find where to change summoners name on new client?

replies.body:
Please... Go Shop down there look at the RP Buy button on the right side is a little button named: Account
There u go!

I don't believe that is available yet through the open beta.  For now (temporarily), you can switch back to the legacy client to make any adjustments.  The option to [launch the legacy client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h1q5) will be available on the launcher under where you input your login information.  Hope that helps!
